title: HighVelocitySalesSettings
description:
Due to a bug, High Velocity Sales needs to be set up and enabled initially using the UI.
Once set up, it can be configured using HighVelocitySalesSettings Metadata https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.api_meta.meta/api_meta/meta_highvelocitysalessettings.htm

setUpAndEnable.title: Set Up and Enable High Velocity Sales
